colla.kernel.api

Interface CollAHost

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Host

    public interface CollAHost
    CollAHost is an application to be executed in determined computers which are available to users to run applications and much more. Only registered users can register hosts on the server.
    Author:
    Bruno Hott

      • compareTo

        int compareTo(CollAHost host)
        Compares two CollAHosts
        Parameters:
        host - a CollAHost to be compared to the one that invokes this method.
        Returns:
        1 if the hosts are equal and 0 otherwise
